titleStmt.title: The speech of that worthy Knight, Sir Beniamin Rudierd, spoken in Parliament concerning the placing of good and able divines in parishes miserably destitute of instruction, through want of maintenance, and confirmed by the testimonies of three judicious, and learned men.
titleStmt.author: Rudyerd, Benjamin, Sir, 1572-1658.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
